unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Diwali Sparkle!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Diwali Sparkle!**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Buying that dream *ghar* in Mumbai or maybe a cozy villa near Bangalore just got a little easier. Banks and housing finance companies are rolling out some sweet deals on home loans, just in time for Diwali!
normalised: Hey folks! Buying that dream *ghar* in Mumbai or maybe a cozy villa near Bangalore just got a little easier. Banks and housing finance companies are rolling out some sweet deals on home loans, just in time for Diwali!

unnormalised: SBI, HDFC, and even some smaller players are offering reduced interest rates, some as low as 8.5% for eligible borrowers. Plus, watch out for processing fee waivers – that's like extra *mithai*! Many are also pushing pre-approved loan schemes for a quicker turnaround. Imagine getting approval at 11:00 AM and house-hunting by evening!
normalised: S B I, H D F C, and even some smaller players are offering reduced interest rates, some as low as eight point five percent for eligible borrowers. Plus, watch out for processing fee waivers – that's like extra *mithai*! Many are also pushing pre-approved loan schemes for a quicker turnaround. Imagine getting approval at eleven a m and house-hunting by evening!

unnormalised: Kotak Mahindra Bank is running a special scheme valid till 31/12/2023, offering cashback on loan disbursals above Rs. 50 Lakhs. ICICI Bank is also promoting longer repayment tenures, stretching up to 30 years! Do your research though, because those extra years mean you pay more interest overall. Remember, *sabse pehle* check your CIBIL score – it's the key! Applications done before 14/11/2023 may even get you a special Diwali gift! Happy house hunting, and may Lakshmi bless your new home! Don't forget to consult a financial advisor at least 05:00 PM before making a decision!
normalised: Kotak Mahindra Bank is running a special scheme valid till thirty first december two thousand and twenty three, offering cashback on loan disbursals above rupee fifty million. I C I C I Bank is also promoting longer repayment tenures, stretching up to thirty years! Do your research though, because those extra years mean you pay more interest overall. Remember, *sabse pehle* check your C I B I L score – it's the key! Applications done before fourteenth november two thousand and twenty three may even get you a special Diwali gift! Happy house hunting, and may Lakshmi bless your new home! Don't forget to consult a financial advisor at least five p m before making a decision!
